name: Runner
summary: Provides the runner that contains the custom logic implementing the specified regular expression.

methods.name: Scan
methods.summary: Scan the starting from base.runtextstart for the next match.

parameters.name: inputSpan
parameters.summary: The text being scanned by the regular expression.

methods.name: TryFindNextPossibleStartingPosition
methods.summary: Search starting from base.runtextpos for the next location a match could possibly start.
methods.returns: true if a possible match was found; false if no more matches are possible.

parameters.name: inputSpan
parameters.summary: The text being scanned by the regular expression.

methods.name: TryMatchAtCurrentPosition
methods.summary: Determine whether at base.runtextpos is a match for the regular expression.
methods.returns: true if the regular expression matches at the current position; otherwise, false.

parameters.name: inputSpan
parameters.summary: The text being scanned by the regular expression.
